casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Yurchiak, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Yurchiak (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 113.]

(Nos. 98-205 and 98-346 Submitted August 19, 1998 Decided September 16, 1998.) Dean Holman, Medina County Prosecuting Attorney, and Joseph F. Salzgeber, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee. Anthony J. Vegh, for appellant. .

*114The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of State v. Rush (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 53, 697 N.E.2d 634.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick; F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
